text:
A while ago, a website talked about the dangers of telling people where you are online. When you say, "I am here," you are also telling many people where you are. Some of these people may not be good to meet. This shows that sharing everything online can have problems. 

The internet gives us many chances to share our lives. We can share our stories and photos. But sometimes, this can be risky. In the past, some people, called bloggers, learned about these risks. They shared their lives online before social media was popular. They had good and bad experiences. 

One of these early bloggers was Justin Hall. In 1994, he was a 19-year-old student. He started sharing his life on the web, which was mostly used by students and scientists. He wrote about everything and shared many photos. In 1996, he began a daily blog. Many people read it because he was very open about his life. 

But one day, Justin had to stop his blog. He fell in love, and when he wrote about it, his partner said he had to choose between the blog and the relationship. He chose love, but he felt sad because sharing his life made people not trust him.

In 2002, Heather Armstrong had a blog called Dooce. She wrote about her job. One day, a coworker shared her blog with their bosses, and she lost her job. This shows that what we say online can have real-life consequences. 

Heather was sad but later got married and started a new blog about her family. Now, she is very popular and makes money from her writing. She learned that we can say anything online, but we should be careful about what we share.

A while ago, some scientists wanted to tell people about a movie called What the Bleep Do We Know? This movie mixes real facts and stories. It shows that we do not know everything about our universe. Some scientists were worried about the movie. They called it “atrocious” and “dangerous.” This made me want to watch it.

At first, I did not understand why the movie was so important. Some scientists talked about new discoveries that show the universe is very strange. But then, the movie talked about how water can change because of thoughts. I heard that a Japanese researcher showed that water can look different based on how people feel. The movie showed nice pictures of ice crystals that looked good when people were happy and bad when people were sad. Many people liked these pictures, but scientists were not impressed. They wanted real proof.

The movie made big claims, but it did not have enough evidence. Scientists have found that water and other things in the universe are very complex. They discovered that the universe has unknown matter and a mysterious force called “dark energy.” 

Scientists are also learning new things about humans. They found that our brains take a little time to understand what happens around us. They believe they know where modern humans first lived and how they spread around the world. Some scientists think there is a link between life on Earth and the design of the universe.

Science is still growing. We do not know everything, and many things are still a mystery. Some scientists are trying to create a “Theory of Everything” to explain all the forces and particles in the universe. But many of us think the universe is simply amazing.

Writing novels is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest. Writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. In the forest, there are tall trees and green leaves. The wind makes the leaves move. In the garden, flowers bloom and attract bees and butterflies. 

Since I started writing, I have written both novels and short stories. When I finish a novel, I want to write short stories. When I finish short stories, I want to write a novel. I do not write short stories while writing a novel, and I do not write a novel while writing short stories. They use different parts of my brain.

I began my writing career in 1975 with two short novels. From 1984 to 1985, I started writing short stories. I did not know much about writing short stories then, but it was a good experience. One of my first short stories, "Breaking Waves," was in my first collection called "Tales from Abroad." 

One good thing about short stories is that they do not take long to finish. It usually takes me about a week to write a short story. Writing a novel takes a long time, sometimes a year or two. Writing a novel can feel very long, and I sometimes wonder if I can finish it. So, writing short stories is a nice change for me. 

Another nice thing about short stories is that you can create a story from small ideas, like a word or an image. It feels like playing music, where the story goes where it wants. If a short story does not work out, it is okay. Not every story has to be perfect. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver have stories that are not great. This makes me feel better. 

I learn from my mistakes in short stories and use that to write better novels. Short stories help me try new things. They are like small memories I have shared with my readers. Writing short stories makes me happy because I can share my feelings.

Science is a way to learn about the world. It helps us understand many things, like tiny atoms and big stars. Science can make our lives better, but it can also cause problems. Scientists study many ideas, and sometimes they disagree. Old ideas can change when new ones come along. 

For example, a long time ago, people thought the universe was like a big clock. Now, scientists know it is much more complicated. They learn new things all the time, like radioactivity and black holes. 

Science is important because it helps us understand how things work. It can also change how we live. We need to pay attention to science because it affects our future and the world we live in. Everyone should try to understand science, so we can make good choices for ourselves and our children.

From around 2015, big book companies said that sales of ebooks were not growing anymore. Some companies even lost money because they thought ebooks were better than printed books. People still ask if ebooks will replace printed books. This question makes us think and talk a lot. Why do we think ebooks and printed books are in a fight? The answer is about how we feel about new things and changes.

In my research, I found that when new technology comes, people often think it will end older things. For example, when television was invented, many people thought radio would die. But radio found new ways to be used, like in cars and factories. The idea that books will disappear is not new. In 1894, some people thought that phonographs would replace books with audiobooks. Many times, people have said that new things will end books, like movies, radio, and smartphones. Some people worried that if books disappeared, culture would get worse. Others thought ebooks were much better.

When new technology comes, we feel both excited and scared. We have strong feelings for things we use every day, like books and computers. When something new, like e-readers, comes out, we have to change how we feel about the old things we love. This is why people still want old products. For example, when the printing press was made in the 15th century, people wanted to find old handwritten books. When movies changed from silent to sound, people missed the old silent films. The same thing happened with photography and music.

E-readers made people appreciate the feel and smell of printed books more. This should make people feel better about printed books not disappearing. But the idea that books might go away will still be a popular story. This story shows how we feel excited about new things but also scared of losing what we know and love.

Every weekday morning for a year and a half, I woke up at 5:30. I brushed my teeth, made coffee, and wrote about how great thinkers from the last four hundred years worked. I wanted to know how they found time to do their best work and how they organized their days to be creative and productive. I wrote about their daily lives, like when they slept, ate, and worked. I wanted to show that they were like us, with habits and routines.

A famous French writer, Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin, said, "Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you what you are." I say, "Tell me what time you eat and if you take a nap." This book is about how people create things, not just what they create. It is also personal. The writer John Cheever said that when you write, you show something about yourself. 

I have questions about my own life: How can I do creative work and also earn money? Is it better to work on one project or a little bit each day? When there is not enough time, do I have to give up things like sleep or a clean house? Or can I learn to do more in less time? I do not have all the answers, but I want to show how many successful people faced similar problems.

The book is called Daily Rituals, but it is really about people’s routines. A routine can seem boring, but it can help us use our time well. A good routine helps us focus and not be affected by our moods. The psychologist William James said that good habits can help us think about more interesting things. 

One Sunday, I was trying to write a story for work, but I kept cleaning my desk and making coffee instead. I am a morning person and work best in the morning. That afternoon, I started looking online for information about other writers’ routines. I thought it would be good to collect these stories, so I started a blog called Daily Routines. 

In the blog, I shared what I found about people’s routines from books and articles. For this book, I gathered more information and tried to keep it interesting. I let the people I wrote about share their own words from letters and interviews. I also used summaries from other sources. This book would not be possible without the help of many writers and researchers. I have listed all my sources in the Notes section for more reading.

Howard wanted to be a palaeontologist. When he was six years old, his family could not go on holiday to Spain. Instead, they went to the beach in England. There, Howard found a special stone called an ammonite. He liked fossils and wanted to study them.

After university, Howard worked hard on his studies. He wanted to learn about the very first living things. He finished his big project, but he was worried. Would he get a job? He felt good about his skills, but he knew that sometimes good people do not get good jobs.

One day, a job opened at Tavistock College in London. Howard applied for it, but he did not think he would get it. On the day of his interview, the professor who was supposed to help him had a bad morning. He got into an accident and could not come. Another professor, who did not like the first one, took his place. This professor helped Howard get the job.

Howard was surprised but happy. He wanted to do the work he loved. He noticed that his job was organized, but his personal life was sometimes chaotic. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his lecture notes. He was very upset. He went back to the college and called to postpone his lecture. 

After that, he had coffee with a colleague. They talked about fossils from a museum in Nairobi. Howard learned about new fossils that needed to be studied. This was a big chance for him. Because of the theft, he changed his plans. He decided not to go to a conference in Stockholm. Instead, he would find a way to visit the museum in Nairobi.

Charles Spence eats many different foods. He is a professor at Oxford University in the UK. He has ice cream made from bee larvae at home. It looks like maggots, but it tastes a little like nuts and flowers. Spence and his team study how we taste food. They want to make eating bugs more normal. 

Spence's work helps big food companies and restaurants. He studies how we experience food. Many things can change how food tastes, like who we eat with, how food looks, and even the noise around us. In his book, The Perfect Meal, he shares interesting facts about food. For example, the first person to order food in a restaurant usually enjoys their meal more. Also, we eat more food when we are with other people.

Spence's lab is simple. It has soundproof rooms and old equipment. He keeps costs low so he can work with chefs who need help. Some of his work is paid for by big food companies. In the past, some people thought this kind of research was not real science. But now, it is important for universities to show their work helps people.

Spence helps food companies reduce salt and sugar in their products. This is good for customers because it helps them stay healthy. Many companies do this slowly so people do not notice the change. Spence found that if you tell people about the changes, they may not like the food as much.

Spence met famous chef Heston Blumenthal while working on a food project. They worked together to create a dish called "Sound of the Sea." Spence studies how sounds can change how we taste food. For example, high sounds can make food taste sweeter, while low sounds can make it taste bitter. Soon, an airline will play music that matches the food they serve.

At home, Spence has fun dinner parties. One time, they ate rabbit with the fur on the cutlery. Another time, they used colorful lights and headphones to see how they changed the taste of drinks. For Spence, home and food events are like his lab.

Our brains are very busy today. We get a lot of information, like facts, rumors, and chatter. We need to find what is important and what we can ignore. We are also doing more things ourselves. Thirty years ago, travel agents helped us book flights, and salespeople helped us in stores. Now, we do these things by ourselves. We are trying to do many tasks at once, like taking care of our families, jobs, hobbies, and watching TV. Our smartphones help us with this.

But there is a problem. We think we can do many things at the same time, but this is not true. A scientist named Earl Miller says our brains are not good at multitasking. When we try to do many things, we switch quickly from one task to another. This is not efficient. Multitasking can make us feel stressed and confused.

When we try to focus on one task but have many distractions, it can lower our ability to think clearly. For example, if we do homework while watching TV, we do not remember the information well. It goes to the wrong part of our brain. Without distractions, we can remember better.

Making decisions while multitasking is also hard for our brains. Small decisions take up a lot of mental energy, just like big decisions. This can lead to making bad choices later.

Many people talk about email as a problem. We get too many emails, and it is hard to keep up. A child once said his father answers emails for a living, and this is true for many people. We feel we must reply to emails, but it is hard to do that and finish other tasks.

In a zoo in Sweden, a chimpanzee named Santino broke concrete at night. He threw the pieces at visitors during the day. Was he being mean? In caves in the US, female bats help other bats that need help to give birth. Are they being kind? Fifty years ago, people did not think much about these questions. They believed animals just acted in ways that could be measured. They thought animals did not have feelings or thoughts like humans. 

But now, this idea is changing. Research on bats, chimps, rats, dolphins, and chickens shows that animals have feelings. This has led to new books about animal emotions, like Mark Bekoff’s "Wild Justice" and Victoria Braithwaite’s "Do Fish Feel Pain?". This has started a big question: Do animals have thoughts and feelings like us? 

Another question is about conscience, which is a sense of right and wrong. In a study with cows, those that opened a locked gate for food seemed happier than those that did not. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does this mean for eating beef? Some people agree with this idea, but others do not. 

Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, who wrote "Second Nature," believes we should stop eating meat. He thinks this is a big change in how we think about ethics. Aubrey Manning, a professor, thinks we should think more about how animals think. He believes animals have simpler thoughts than humans. Professor Euan MacPhail thinks we should not put human feelings on animals. 

These ideas are hard to agree on because they are not just scientific questions, but also philosophical ones. It is very hard to define what consciousness is. Can we ever know what it is like to be a bat? 

Balcombe did an important study that showed starlings, a type of bird, can feel sad. In the study, some starlings lived in nice cages, and some lived in small, empty cages. When both groups were given bad food, only the starlings in nice cages ate. Balcombe thinks that living in a bad cage made the starlings feel negative about life. 

Balcombe, who works with animal rights groups, believes that in the future, people will look back and see how we treated animals as wrong. He says we cannot support animal rights while eating meat. 

If only Balcombe believed this, it might be easy to ignore him. But Professor Aubrey Manning agrees with him. He has written a book about animal behavior. He says we are changing how we think about animals again. In the past, people thought animals thought like us, but now we are seeing things differently. This is a complicated topic, and it is important to listen carefully to different opinions.

Critical thinking is how we understand what we read or hear. Adrian West, a researcher, says that arguing can help us find the truth. Technology helps us store and process information, but it can also make it hard to think deeply. West mentions that we see a lot of poor thinking and opinions that can confuse us. More information does not always mean better understanding or decisions. 

Reading books has gone down a lot, and this may hurt our critical thinking skills. Patricia Greenfield, a psychology professor, believes that focusing more on videos and fast media makes it harder to think about one thing deeply. We do not yet know exactly how technology affects our thinking. 

Technology can be both good and bad. For example, some video games can help us think better, while reading online can improve our analysis skills. Greenfield says that reading helps our imagination and critical thinking, but many visual media do not give us time to think. This can lead to young people not reaching their full potential.

How we see technology affects how we think critically. James Paul Gee, an educational psychology professor, says that video games can be good for kids. They are fun and can help us learn. Some games teach us to make decisions and think critically in a way that feels real. 

In today’s world, as reading and math scores go down, we need to understand how technology affects our thinking.

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office but did not like it. He writes about how we should live. His first book talks about the good things about working with your hands. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life. 

One day, while shopping, he saw ads on a credit card machine while he was waiting. He realized that it is hard to avoid these ads. They take our attention away from what we want to think about. This makes it hard to remember conversations. People do not want to talk to strangers anymore because they are always interrupted.

Crawford says we see the world through things like video games and phone apps. These things show us what we want, but they can take over our lives. Many people complain about emails at work but still check emails in their free time. Studies show that just seeing a phone can make it hard to focus. 

Crawford believes that technology makes us more self-focused. We have many choices, and this makes it hard to control ourselves. People prefer to text instead of talking face to face. He thinks this is bad for society. 

He gives an example of a gym. In the past, there was one music player for everyone. Now, people listen to their own music with ear buds. The gym used to be a place to meet others, but now it is not. 

Crawford has two ideas to help. First, we need to reduce noise and distractions in public places. Second, he thinks we should do activities that connect us to the real world, like cooking or playing sports. These activities help us focus on real things and not just screens. 

He says that paying attention to one thing can help us pay attention to other things too. It is important to find ways to use our judgment and enjoy real experiences.

"What do you do for work?" This is a common question. Many people answer it with a few words about their job. But if you are a philosopher, it can be harder to answer. Saying "I am a philosopher" can sound fancy. It feels better to say "I study or teach philosophy." Some people think philosophers know special truths. This is not true. Philosophers are just like everyone else.

Philosophers often think about life and how people live. A famous philosopher named Aristotle said that thinking about life is very important. Many people today do not agree with him, but philosophy is still seen as important for the mind. Another philosopher, Socrates, said that a life without thinking is not a good life. He meant that we should think about our lives and choices.

Thinking about our lives does not mean we need to read many books or be very smart. It means we should look closely at our daily experiences. We do not need to be alone to think about life. In fact, thinking about life can help us make better choices. 

However, many philosophers work in universities and do not talk to regular people. This makes philosophy seem far away from real life. Philosophers often write for other experts, not for everyone. Because of this, many people think philosophy is not for them. 

I sometimes call myself an "ethicist" because I study ethics, which is about what is right and wrong. But ethics is often seen as only about rules and laws. Recently, I feel this is not enough. Ethics also looks at social issues and what is fair. 

Ethicists ask important questions, like if downloading movies illegally is wrong (it is). We also think about responsibility and how we see art. Philosophy helps us understand our actions and beliefs. Sometimes we find out we already know the answer. Other times, we learn that our beliefs are hard to explain. By thinking about these ideas, we can help everyone.

Food is important to many people, like food lovers, chefs, and those who enjoy eating. People often think about food and how it makes them happy. In the past, when philosophers talked about food, they usually meant something else, like learning or knowledge. Sometimes, they seemed to talk about food, but they were really discussing other ideas.

One famous philosopher, Epicurus, believed in seeking pleasure and avoiding pain. His name is now often linked to enjoying food and drinks. Many restaurants and food shops use his name because they think it will attract customers. Food is also social and cultural. The food we eat comes from history and is shared with our friends and family. Our communities help us grow and share food.

When food is ready, critics talk and write about it. Some people wonder why food critics are important. One philosopher said that tasting food is not a special skill; critics are just good at describing flavors. Most studies about how we perceive things focus on sight, not taste, which should change.

Food can also be beautiful. We often talk about art and music being beautiful, but not food. Some philosophers think that food deserves to be talked about in the same way as art because of modern cooking. However, food is eaten and gone, unlike paintings or music, which last over time.

There are many questions about food and ethics. We can ask what we should eat: organic, free-range, local, vegetarian, or non-GMO foods? Our answers show our beliefs. Philosophers like to discuss these questions about food.

Cooking at home is different from cooking in restaurants. Home cooks have a special duty to their friends and family. Everyone shares food and time together. Restaurant cooks have responsibilities to their boss and the food. Their kitchens are not open to everyone, and they work with colleagues, not friends.

A recent essay called "Diplomacy of the Dish" talks about how food can help people from different cultures connect. We can learn to enjoy other people's food and build friendships by eating together. The essay includes many interesting stories that make food philosophy fun to read.

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He makes special board games called "legacy" games. When he was a child, he played board games, but he thought they were not fun or challenging anymore. He wanted to make board games better. He asked himself if board games could have stories and if choices in one game could affect the next game.

He changed a classic game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, choices made by players can change the game forever. Players might have to tear up cards or change the game board. The game is played over several sessions, and players remember their past actions.

Rob also worked on a legacy version of another game called Pandemic. In Pandemic, players work together to stop diseases. His next game was called SeaFall. Pandemic Legacy was very popular, but SeaFall was a new challenge because it was not based on an old game. In SeaFall, players are sailors exploring a new world.

Designing legacy games is hard. Designers must think about all the choices players can make. They need testers to see how the game works. Jaime Barriga was a tester for SeaFall. He said it takes a lot of time to make the game right. Sometimes the game works well at first, but later it can break, and they have to fix it.

Rob did not think legacy games would be very popular. He thought only a few people would like them. But many players, like Russell Chapman, really enjoy them. He thinks legacy games are a big step forward in game design. Players like the excitement of learning new things in the game.

Another fan, Ben Hogg, said that even if players worry about changing the game, they still enjoy the adventure. He compared it to watching a movie. People like new experiences, just like in video games.

Rob Daviau wanted to tell stories through games. He once wanted to be a TV writer. Matt Leacock, who created Pandemic, said making legacy games is like writing a book. You need to know how the story starts and ends, but you also need to plan the details.

Rob is happy to see how others use his ideas, but he thinks players will soon want something new. Colby Dauch, who works for the company that published SeaFall, believes legacy games change how people think about board games.

One night, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at the National Aquarium in New Zealand. He crawled across the floor and went into a small drain that led to the Pacific Ocean. This story was exciting and many people shared it online. 

People like to think that animals are like us. Octopuses are very smart. They can open jars, recognize faces, and even play. Dr. Frans de Waal studies animals like gorillas and chimpanzees. He believes that we often do not see how smart animals are. He says that animals can think about the past and future, feel empathy, and understand what others want. 

In the past, people thought animals were smart. For example, in medieval Europe, animals could be put on trial for crimes. Charles Darwin, a famous scientist, said that humans and animals are different, but not in a big way. 

In the 20th century, many people thought animals were not very smart. They believed animals only acted because of rewards or punishments. This was a time when humans were harming animal homes and not caring for them. 

Now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals are smarter than we thought. He says that animals have their own special skills. For example, squirrels can remember where they hide their nuts, while we need apps to find our phones. 

Inky’s story is popular, but Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really knew how to escape to the ocean. He did an experiment with monkeys to see if they feel envy. When some monkeys got cucumbers and others got grapes, the ones with cucumbers got very upset. This study showed that animals have feelings too. 

In the end, we are learning more about how smart animals really are.

Robots are becoming very important in our world. They are not just in stories anymore; they are in factories and other places. Many people think that robots will do a lot of the work that humans do in the next 50 years. But most people also believe their jobs will stay the same. This is not true. Robots will change many jobs.

For example, a company in Australia made a robot called Hadrian X. This robot can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour. Two human workers would take a whole day to do this. Another robot, Tally, helps in supermarkets. It checks if the shelves have enough products and if they are priced correctly.

Some people think robots will create new jobs for skilled workers, like technicians. But others worry that we need human skills at work. Dr. Jing Bing Zhang studies how robots will change jobs. He says that in two years, many robots will be smarter and work well with humans. In three years, big companies will have special people to manage robots.

Zhang also says that many jobs in robotics will not be filled because there are not enough skilled workers. He believes that people need to learn new skills to keep their jobs. 

New robots will also be made for homes. These robots will be able to talk and help us in ways we have not seen before. This is a big chance for companies, but it also brings challenges. We need new rules to keep people safe and protect their privacy.

With many jobs at risk, it is important to focus on education. Countries need more students in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) to stay strong in the future.

Text: George Mallory was a mountaineer. He was asked why he wanted to climb Mount Everest. He said, "Because it’s there." This means he wanted to climb for fun and adventure. Many people wonder why anyone would want to climb mountains. 

A writer named Tejada-Flores wrote an essay called "Games that Climbers Play." He talked about different types of climbing, from climbing small rocks to big mountains. Each type has its own rules. 

Climbing can make people feel free, but it can also be hard. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not fun. Some people think that having fewer choices while climbing can make life simpler and give a different kind of freedom.

Another climber, Joe Fitschen, asked a different question: "Why do people climb?" He thinks climbing is part of being human. We like to take on challenges, even if they are risky. 

A teacher named Brian Treanor wrote that climbing can help us learn important values like courage and respect for nature. He believes these values are important in our modern world.

Some expert climbers, Ebert and Robinson, said that climbing alone is harder and deserves more recognition than climbing with a team or using special tools. But this idea can be dangerous for some climbers.

Climbing can also be a way to feel calm and focused. Many climbers talk about being in the moment or feeling peaceful while climbing. This is similar to some ideas in Zen philosophy, which helps people find peace of mind. 

So, there are many reasons why people like to climb mountains.

Alfred Brendel is a famous pianist. He played classical music for over sixty years. He was very smart and serious. He played many piano pieces and recorded them, but he did not teach many students. People who knew him saw that he could be fun, but he was usually serious in concerts. He studied a lot, traveled, and performed.

A few years ago, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel’s concerts. Kit asked Brendel for piano lessons. At first, Brendel did not want to teach him because he had very few students. He thought it was not a good idea. But when he heard Kit play, he changed his mind. Kit was 14 years old and played very well. Brendel thought Kit was special and decided to teach him.

Now, Kit is 19 years old. He is always busy learning new things like languages, math, and computer coding. He also plays tennis and writes music. His mother is always with him to help. Brendel says Kit has a great memory and listens well when he teaches him. Kit understands quickly and can play what Brendel shows him.

Brendel is careful not to make big promises about Kit. He does not want people to expect too much from him. Some newspapers say Kit will be a great pianist, but Brendel thinks this is not good. Young musicians can play some things very well, but they need time to learn other things.

Now, at 80 years old, Brendel is happy in his life after performing. He did not want to be famous quickly. He wanted to achieve his goals by 50 years old. When he reached 50, he felt he had done many things but still wanted to do more. Even though he cannot play like before, he still thinks about music and enjoys his new life.

When I was a child, I thought gardens were beautiful places. My grandad’s garden was by a river. It went down gently to the water. You could not touch the water, but you could hear it and the birds in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this – a nice and quiet place. 

Grandad’s garden was simple. He did not have a big greenhouse like some neighbors. Their greenhouses were made from old windows and plastic. At home, my dad was quiet. He was not serious all the time. He liked to say funny things. He often said, “It’s immaterial to me,” instead of “I don’t mind.” 

My dad did not finish school and became a plumber. He did not love plumbing, but it was his job. He was not very ambitious, but he and my mum thought about moving to Canada once. They never did. At home, he was good at fixing things. He could build bookshelves and cupboards very well. 

My parents only moved house once. But my mum liked to change the furniture a lot. Just when you got used to one chair, a new one would come. The biggest change was a piano. I wanted to like it, but it made me nervous. I liked the two brass candlesticks on it, but my mum said they were too fancy and took them away. I never got to play the piano, but my sister had lessons. When I asked my mum why I could not play, she said, “You’d never have practiced.”

I liked the river best of all places – more than moors or woods. I could imagine many things by the river. I would take a fishing net and wear old sandals. I walked along the riverbank looking for a good place to take off my sandals. I would look for fish in the water to catch. But after trying to keep them alive at home, I had to put them back in the river.

I wanted to leave school quickly, but it seemed hard. One day, my dad said, “There is a job for an apprentice gardener in the Parks Department. I thought you might like it.” In that moment, my dad surprised me. He might have wanted me to be a carpenter, but I think he hoped I would be happy as a gardener. Even if he did not like gardening, he saw how much I loved it.

Lawrence MacEwen is on his island, the Isle of Muck, in Scotland. I am with him. The wind is very strong, and it feels like it could blow us off the cliff. But Lawrence is not worried. He has a sheepdog named Tie. The wind is loud, but Lawrence feels at home on his island.

Lawrence shows me around. He points to another island called Eigg. He says the island next to it is Rum, and it rains a lot there. I see dark clouds and rain on Rum. He also mentions another island called Soay. 

Suddenly, Lawrence says he needs to move his sheep. We walk down the hill. He tells me that the Isle of Muck is three kilometers long and one and a half kilometers wide. The geese here eat a lot of grass. The MacEwen family has lived on this island for 3000 years.

Lawrence calls Tie to help with the sheep, but Tie is not doing it right. Lawrence is disappointed. The MacEwen family runs the island together. Lawrence and his wife, Jenny, have a son named Colin and a daughter named Mary. Colin takes care of the cottages, and Mary runs the hotel with her husband, Toby. Mary’s two boys can play outside and sail in the summer. They go out and come back when they are hungry.

Life on the island is not always easy. There is electricity only sometimes. One night, I wait for the lights to come on. The next morning, I see Mary making breakfast with a flashlight. There is also no mobile phone service. Mary tells me that some people go to the hill to use their phones, but most just put them away. 

Today, a boat brings groceries and three musicians. They play music in the tearoom, and everyone enjoys it. That night, Lawrence tells me how he met Jenny. Her father bought a farm on Soay without seeing it. Jenny had to manage the farm, but she did not know much about it.

I sleep while it rains. I eat well because most of the food comes from the island. Mary sends me to get fresh fish from a fisherman named Sandy. I bring the fish back to Mary. By 7 pm, we eat the fish, and it is very good.

The next morning, I have to take a ferry to another island. Many ferries have been canceled because of bad weather. If my ferry does not come, I will stay on Muck for two more days. Part of me wants to stay longer, even without a phone.

Text: 

The game design industry used to be for computer scientists and self-taught people. Many thought video games were just a hobby for young people. Now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It is not easy to get into this industry. Making video games, especially those based on movies, needs many people and a lot of skill. 

Jim Donelly, who works for an online games magazine, says it is hard to work in big companies. But the industry needs game designers. They need not just the big bosses but also people who design parts of the games. 

So, how can you start working in this industry? Many companies want people with a degree in computer science, but Jim thinks you should just make games. You need to show what you can do. Game design is not just a job; it is a way of life. 

Another expert, John Field, says it is not easy to do it alone. A good course in games can help you. Most game designers start as programmers or artists and then move up. They love all kinds of entertainment and art. They know that games are their passion. 

Connections are also important. To succeed in games, you need to meet people in the industry. 

The idea that only young boys play video games is changing. Now, many adults and families play games together. Smartphones have many new games through apps and social media. John believes there is a lot of room for growth in games. They are fun and can help us learn new things.

Since I was a child, I wanted to play football. My dad helped me and encouraged me to play. I had a friend whose dad was very strict. He always said, "You can’t do this, you can’t do that." My friend stopped wanting to play football because of this. I am happy that I still love football. 

When I score a great goal, some people say it is just luck, but it is not. I have practiced a lot since I was a kid. You need to practice to score amazing goals. The best players in the world practice for many years. 

I learned how to play well. When I teach kids, I tell them to enjoy learning. At school, I played many sports like rounders, baseball, athletics, and basketball. I know school is important, but I only thought about football then. 

I want my son to enjoy learning too. We read him books, even if he is too young to sit still. I hope he does not just want to kick the books around. 

When I started my football career, my manager helped young players like me. He did not make a big deal about it, but we knew we had to do well. I scored in my first game, but we lost. A TV presenter said, "You can’t win anything with kids." This made us work harder. 

I trust my friends and family a lot. I have money, but it can cause problems. Some people say, "I can’t believe your mother still works." I help my parents with money. I paid off their house and bought them a car. My mom loves her job as a hairdresser, and I want to help my family. 

I have money, but it does not solve everything. After I stop playing football, I want to take a break and do things I could not do before. I want to go skiing right after I stop playing. I cannot do that now because if I get hurt, I cannot play football again.

Text: 

We lived at Reef Point because of Sam Carter. Sam was my father’s agent in Los Angeles. He helped us find a cheap place to live. My father could not write anything in Los Angeles, and Sam was worried about losing money.

In the summer, the beach was empty because of the sea fog. Many people went to a nicer place called La Carmella instead of Reef Point. Only people who had no money or loved surfing came to Reef Point. But now, with the hot weather, many people were at the beach. 

My father worked hard every day to write a script. I often went to the beach with my dog, Rusty. When we first moved to Reef Point, we did not have a dog. Rusty came to us and would not leave. I tried to send him away, but he always came back. One day, I gave him some water. My father did not like Rusty at first, but he did not really try to chase him away.

Rusty loved the beach. He liked to dig and bring things to me. Sometimes he found things that were not his, like a sneaker or a beach towel. I had to give those back to their owners. Rusty also liked to swim with me, even though I could swim better and faster.

One day, my father went to Los Angeles to deliver his script. Rusty and I played in the sea all afternoon. As the sun began to set, it got cooler, and we watched the surfers. They had been surfing all day and did not seem tired. One surfer was very good. She made the others look clumsy. 

When she finished, she came to talk to me. “Hi! Why didn’t you join us?” she asked. “I don’t have a surfboard,” I replied. “You could get one,” she said. “I have no money,” I said. “You’re British, right? Are you visiting?” she asked. “No, I live here,” I answered. “Is your father American?” she asked. “No, he is writing a film script from a book he wrote.” “Really? What is his name?” she asked. “Rufus Marsh,” I said. “Oh! I know him! I read his book, Tall as the Morning.” She looked at me with interest. I felt happy because she was friendly and liked my father’s book.

Violet Hetherington was in a long line at the dock in Southampton. She felt worried and asked herself, "What have I done?" Her friend Annie told her to arrive late to avoid waiting too long. But now, Violet was stuck in a long line to get on the Queen Caroline ship.

After some time, an announcement said there was a problem with the computers. People in line started to feel unhappy. They had paid a lot of money for this trip, and they wanted to enjoy it. Violet felt like she made a mistake coming on this cruise. She checked her bag for her phone but could not find it. This made her even more upset because she needed her phone to call for help.

Violet saw a nice couple behind her in line. She asked them if she could use their phone to call her son Harry. She left a message for him to ask their neighbor, Kristina, if she could check if Violet's phone was at home. If it was not there, Violet would have a hard time finding important numbers in New York.

Finally, the line moved, and Violet gave her travel documents to the worker. When she got inside the ship, it looked like a fancy hotel but not very nice. There were shiny decorations and crowded elevators. Violet felt squished in the lift as it went up, stopping at each floor to let people out.

When she reached the twelfth floor, she was happy to find her room had a balcony, just like she wanted. She had worried about this, but now she felt relieved. Violet had paid a lot of money for this trip to make sure she had a good time by the sea.

John Maloof went to an auction and bought a box of old photo negatives. He wanted pictures for a book about Portage Park, a neighborhood in Chicago, USA. Instead, he found 30,000 photos by Vivian Maier, a street photographer. Maloof has collected many things from Maier's life, like her cameras, 2,000 rolls of film, 3,000 prints, and 100,000 negatives. He also has some old movies and audiotapes.

One morning, Maloof looked at all the things he found. He felt lucky. He said, "When I bought this, I didn’t know what it was." Maloof is a flea market seller and could have sold everything to someone else. Now, he and his friend Anthony Rydzon are trying to learn more about Maier’s life. They talked to families who knew her when she worked as a nanny and to people who developed her film.

Vivian Maier was born in 1926 in New York. She lived in France when she was a child. In 1951, she came back to New York and moved to Chicago in 1956 to work as a nanny. Maier was a private person but always had a camera. She wore big coats, wide hats, and strong shoes. Maren Baylaender, who knew her, said Maier took her camera on her days off and did not come back until late at night. Maier had strong opinions about movies and politics.

Maier loved theatre and movies. She was not very social, but she walked the streets with her camera and talked to people. She liked to document the world around her. Rydzon said, "She was a true artist and followed her dreams." Maier’s work was not for money. She took pictures of women, children, old people, and the poor.

Photography expert Larry Silverman said, "Vivian has many interesting pictures." He thinks she was influenced by other photographers. Maloof wonders if he will ever look through all the negatives he has in three big, fireproof cabinets. He did not care much about photography until he found Maier’s work. Now, he takes his own pictures inspired by her. He said, "I realized there was so much more to this work than I thought." Now, Maloof wants to share Vivian Maier’s name and make sure she is remembered in history.

Eleanor Catton is a young writer from New Zealand. Her book, The Luminaries, is very successful. I talked to her in the UK when her book was popular. She was calm and friendly. She had just come from Germany and was going back to New Zealand the next day.

Eleanor told me a funny story. One time, at the airport, a man asked her to prove she was a writer. She showed him her book. He asked, “What is it about?” This is a hard question for a writer. 

The Luminaries takes place in New Zealand in the 1860s. There are many crimes, and twelve men are trying to solve them. The story is complicated. Eleanor wanted to write a murder mystery, but she found that the past made the story more interesting. Her book is very long, over 800 pages, because she wanted to give a good story to each of the 20 main characters.

When I asked her how it feels to be successful at a young age, she said it feels nice. She feels that people in New Zealand share in her success. She also said it can be annoying when people think her book is not deep or thoughtful.

Eleanor wanted to write the book in a special way. Each part of the book is shorter than the one before. This makes the story go faster. She said she wanted to create patterns in the book. If readers notice them, that’s good, but it’s not necessary.

Even with its special structure, The Luminaries is still an exciting murder mystery. Eleanor said she did not plan the whole story before writing it. She liked to write herself into difficult situations and then find a way out.

Eleanor also loves TV shows. I asked if she would like to write for TV. She thought that would be cool. She gets very excited when she talks about writing and New Zealand. She said being in a new place changes how she thinks about stories. 

For now, she will stay in New Zealand, and I hope it helps her write more great books.

Jonny Kinkead is a man who loves guitars. When he was a boy, he played with a guitar and made things in his dad's garage. Now, for over forty years, he has made guitars by hand. Jonny says, "I love the guitar. It is amazing that two pieces of wood can make beautiful music."

Jonny learned to play guitar when he was eleven years old. At sixteen, he wanted a bass guitar. Instead of saving money, he decided to make one himself. He studied how different shapes and types of wood make different sounds. He had made model boats and planes with his brothers, so he knew how to build things. His dad taught him how to use tools. Jonny also fixed guitars for his friends.

Jonny's first bass guitar was good, but he did not think about making guitars as a job. He liked painting and sculpture too. After school, he studied architecture because he liked design. But halfway through, he left school. He realized that making guitars is like making art, but it is also something people can use.

For ten years, Jonny made guitars and cleaned windows to earn money. At first, he sold his guitars for the cost of materials. As he became known as a good guitar maker, he could charge more money. Even now, he says he does not make a lot of money. He can only make about ten guitars a year.

In the beginning, Jonny went to music festivals to show his guitars. He wanted musicians to try them and tell their friends. He also had to learn how to price his guitars. When he started, many people thought only American guitars were good. But now, UK-made guitars are also seen as good.

Jonny thinks new guitar makers today have an easier time. He believes they should take classes to learn. But he also thinks it is important to learn by trying and making mistakes. He says, "Look at other instruments, see what works and what does not. If you learn from someone else, you may only learn one way. If you teach yourself, you can learn many things."

When people talk in English, they often start with the weather. A famous writer, Dr. Johnson, said that when two English people meet, they first talk about the weather. This is still true today. Many people wonder why English people talk about the weather so much. They think it is because English weather is interesting. 

An American writer, Bill Bryson, says that English weather is not very exciting. He thinks that in other places, the weather can be very dramatic, like tornadoes or big storms. But in England, the weather is usually calm. Another writer, Jeremy Paxman, disagrees with Bryson. He believes that English weather is interesting because it is always changing. 

I think both writers miss the real reason why English people talk about the weather. When they say things like, "Nice day, isn’t it?" or "Ooh, isn’t it cold?" they are not really asking about the weather. These phrases are just ways to start a conversation or fill a pause. 

Talking about the weather helps English people connect with each other. There are three main times when they use weather talk: as a greeting, to start a conversation, or when there is a quiet moment. This is why it seems like English people talk about the weather all the time. They might start with a weather greeting, then talk a little more about the weather, and return to it if the conversation stops. This is why many people think English people are obsessed with the weather.

Alice Leader was in front of Hadrian’s Wall in Britain. She was with her class of 12- and 13-year-olds. She wanted to tell them how amazing it was that the Romans built this wall. The wall is 120 km long and 5 meters high. It was built about 1900 years ago. The students chose to visit the wall instead of going to Spain, Greece, or France. They wanted to know why the wall was built, but Alice felt she did not have good answers.

Alice could not find a good book about the wall and Roman times, so she decided to write one herself. She stopped teaching after 31 years and became a writer in 2001. She felt nervous but excited about this new job. Alice said teaching is like acting. It is hard work. Writing is different; it is fun but not as tiring. Her old teaching friends are jealous because she still talks to children through her stories.

Alice wants her books to be different from many other books for kids today. Many books are about sad things or are just fantasy, like Harry Potter. Alice’s books are not like that. She always taught English and History together. She loves to see when children go from being bored to being interested. She thinks it is her job to make learning fun.

Alice started writing because she felt she had time after her sons left home. Her head teacher suggested she take a writing course. At first, Alice did not want to go. But she had to send a story to join the course. She quickly wrote a story about a Roman couple and sent it in. She was accepted into the course. The other students liked her story and told her to publish it.

Alice asked her school head teacher for a year off to write her first book. Her husband, Zachary Leader, helps her with her writing. He reads her work and suggests changes. Alice likes to add more scenes to her stories. She thinks they work well together.

To raise money for charity, a newspaper and a TV company asked two brothers, Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, to race. Jonny is older and a champion triathlete. They raced in the Yorkshire Dales in northern England. Jonny drove a car on the road, and Alistair rode a mountain bike across the land.

“I’m excited!” said Jonny. “I have never done this before. The views are beautiful, and I will be warm in the car.” Alistair was ready too, wearing warm cycling clothes. He said, “I have seen Jonny drive. I am not sure he will win. I might stop for tea!”

The race started at Semerwater lake and finished at Fleet Moss, which is very high. Jonny thought it would be easy for the car, but Alistair had to climb a steep hill. They quickly shook hands and started the race. Alistair rode fast on his bike, while Jonny drove the car.

Jonny’s car faced a problem right away. A big tractor was in the road. “Welcome to Yorkshire,” he said to the cameraman. “If Alistair wins, it’s because of this farmer!” After the tractor, Jonny drove on. Alistair was having a hard time. He had to get off his bike and carry it up the hill. Sheep watched him as he walked.

Finally, Alistair reached the top of the hill. The sun came out, and he started to ride fast. In the car, Jonny had to go slowly through narrow roads and a stream. He was trying to get to the finish line.

Neither brother knew who was winning. Jonny drove fast to the finish, and Alistair rode hard from the other side. When Alistair reached the finish line, he asked, “Is he here?” The crowd said no. He raised his arms and shouted, “Yes!”

A few minutes later, Jonny arrived in the car. “Well done,” he said to Alistair, but he looked sad. “I’m upset.”

Text: 

When you play on Centre Court at Wimbledon, it is very quiet. You bounce the ball on the soft grass. You throw it up to serve and hit it. You can only hear your own shots. The grass is nice, the place has a lot of history, and the players wear white. The people in the crowd are respectful. This quiet helps me play better. 

In a tennis match, I try to focus only on the game. When I win a point, the crowd cheers and claps. I hear them, but it feels far away. I don’t think about the fifteen thousand people watching me. I don’t even think about the millions of people watching on TV when I play Roger Federer in the 2008 Wimbledon final. This is the biggest match of my life. 

I always wanted to play at Wimbledon. My uncle Toni, my coach, told me it is the biggest tournament. When I was 14, I dreamed of playing there and winning. Before 2008, I played Federer and lost two times. In 2006, I was happy just to be there. Federer won easily. But in 2007, I was very sad. I knew I could have played better. I cried for half an hour after that match. Losing hurts, especially when you have a chance to win.

Toni usually does not comfort me, but after my loss in 2007, he told me not to cry. He said there would be more chances to play at Wimbledon. I felt like this was my last chance. I know that being a professional athlete is short, and I want to make the most of it. 

In 2008, I had another chance. I felt ready and confident. I learned from my loss the year before. The night before the final, I had dinner with my family and friends. We did not talk about the match because I was already thinking about it in my mind. I wanted to keep that space for myself until the match started.

In April 1957, a young English woman named Jane Goodall came to Africa. She wrote home and said, "I am living in the Africa I have always wanted." Jane spent most of her life in Africa. She worked as a journalist, scientist, and activist. She became famous for her work with chimpanzees. 

In 1963, the National Geographic Society in Britain made her more famous by sharing her research in articles and TV shows. Jane wrote many books, including children's books and a popular book called "In the Shadow of Man." This book has been translated into 47 languages and is still available today. 

Jane Goodall is one of the most famous female scientists of the 20th century. Many stories have been told about her life, but they often focus on her adventures and not her real work. She has done important research on chimpanzees. Before her work, people did not know that chimpanzees eat meat or use tools. They also did not know that chimpanzees have feelings like humans and live in social groups similar to ours. 

Jane wrote a book called "The Chimpanzees of Gombe," which is very important for studying chimpanzees. Her research in Gombe State, Nigeria, is considered one of the great scientific achievements. Jane changed how we study animals and how we think about ourselves as humans.

Even as a child, Jane showed her interest in animals. When she was five years old, she disappeared one day. Her family and the police looked for her. After a long search, she came back with straw in her hair. She had crawled into a henhouse to see how hens lay eggs. She stayed very still for five hours to find out. This was the start of her love for biology.

Shirley Ford is a voice actor. In our first talk, she uses many funny voices. She can sound like a young boy, a tired mother, an old Scottish woman, and even a fast-talking alien. People know her voices from children’s TV shows and safety videos. Shirley says, “I just did a voiceover about back injuries. I had to learn many medical words quickly.”

Shirley explains that doing voiceovers is not easy. Many famous actors think they can do funny voices, but it is more than that. You must make the words exciting for people who cannot see you. Many well-known actors want to do voiceovers, but they often do not get the job because they are used to acting with their whole body.

After school, Shirley took a drama course. She wanted to be a regular actor. Sometimes, she sang for TV ads. One day, the man at the recording studio asked her to try out for a rabbit voice in a cartoon. She thought it was silly but tried it for fun. To her surprise, she got the part! Shirley found out she could do voices and liked voiceover work.

In her second film, she played the main character and also her brother and mother. Many women voice small boys and girls because their voices are higher. It is hard to find child actors, so companies often choose women instead. Shirley learned to make different sounds and watches children’s TV to get new voices.

Shirley enjoys working on cartoons the most. She also does educational videos and ads. She says, “It is hard to sound happy about something I don’t care about, but I learned to smile when I talk. It makes my voice sound bright.” When she works on cartoons, it feels like a holiday because she enjoys working with other actors.

There is a lot of competition for voiceover jobs. A good showreel, which shows what you can do, is very important. Shirley says, “It is good to have a strong showreel. There are agencies that help voice actors make them.” She believes she is successful because she works hard and does not give up. 

For people who want to be voice actors, Shirley suggests going to special workshops. She loves voices and becomes the characters she plays. Sometimes, if she does an American voice, she talks like that for hours or days. Her children are used to her speaking in different voices.

People often ask me how I became a cartoonist. This is normal because many kids dream of being cartoonists, like they dream of being race car drivers. But most people stop dreaming and choose other jobs, like being a lawyer or making car parts. It seems silly to think you can make money by drawing funny pictures. But some people do it.

Not everyone becomes a cartoonist in the same way. Most cartoonists wanted to do this job for a long time. I loved comic strips as a kid, drew for my school, and was known as "the kid who draws." I studied graphic design in college. After I finished school, I showed my drawings to different companies. I was lucky to find a newspaper that wanted political cartoons. I drew some ideas, and they bought them. Soon, I was making enough money to live.

You don’t need a university degree or a lot of money to be a cartoonist. You just need your brain, your hand, and something to draw with. But it is not easy. It is better to have other skills too. I have done political cartoons, comic strips, and comic books. I have also written and designed. I take any job because I can learn a lot from all kinds of work. It helps to be smart and curious about the world.

Now, many cartoonists have to sell their own work. It is not enough to just draw. The better you are at selling your work, the more successful you will be. I have seen cartoonists who are not very creative but are good at business do better than very talented artists who do not know how to sell.

Some people worry too much about others stealing their ideas. They are scared to show their work. To protect your drawings, you can write a small ‘c’ for ‘copyright’ and put your name and the date next to it. But really, it is more likely that no one will care about your work. If someone does take your cartoon and it becomes popular online, it can be a good thing!

Twenty years ago, I was moving to a new house. I was cleaning and decided to throw away my electric guitar. My dad bought it for my 16th birthday. I usually don’t like to throw things away, so I felt bad. I took the guitar to the dump. A young man saw me and asked, “You are not going to throw that away, right?” I said yes, and he asked if he could have it. I said yes, and we went our own ways.

After that, I felt sad about giving it away. A few months ago, I got an email that changed my life. It was from a man named Keith Rushton. He said, “I have your electric guitar.” He found my guitar after it was sold many times. He saw my name on a label on the guitar and found me online. He contacted me through my work at a newspaper and wanted to sell it back to me. I was very happy and would have paid anything for it, but his price was fair.

My dad always put name labels on my things, even my guitar. My parents wanted me to learn classical guitar because it was popular in the 1970s. I loved the sound of it. It was nice and gentle. But I had trouble learning it, so I switched to electric guitar. At that time, punk music was popular, and anyone could be a rock star.

When I opened the box with my guitar, I remembered my birthday in 1978 when my parents gave it to me. The guitar felt smooth and smaller than I remembered. I held it and wanted to stand up to play it. My fingers remembered where to go. I felt a little pain in my fingers from pressing the strings. 

The electric guitar is not usually played alone. Now that I am learning it again, I want to form a band. My son is learning the saxophone, so maybe we can play together. There might be other people my age who feel the same way. We could call ourselves “The Regainers!”

Text: 

Many people are talking about sleep now. I wrote a book called Insomniac. It is about people who cannot sleep. I wanted to tell everyone that not sleeping is bad for our minds and bodies. People who have trouble sleeping know how important sleep is. It is good that people are paying more attention to sleep. 

But what about dreams? I do not hear much about dreams. When you wake up early, you lose sleep. You lose the time when you dream. This time is called REM, which means Rapid Eye Movement. We have the best dreams in this stage of sleep. A good sleeper spends about one-fourth of their sleep time in REM. If a person lives for 90 years, they will spend six or seven years dreaming.

When scientists take away REM sleep, people dream more the next night. This shows that dreams are important. In 1953, scientists found REM sleep. A famous psychologist, Sigmund Freud, said that dreams help us understand our minds. But later studies showed that dreams are not that simple. Now, scientists study dreams more for their physical reasons than for their psychological reasons. 

Robert Stickgold, a sleep scientist, says that dream researchers do not agree on many things. Dreams are important. A study by P.F. Pagel found that actors, writers, and directors remember and use their dreams better than other people. This shows that creative people use their dreams more. 

Stickgold says that dreams help us think in new ways. They help us connect old and new ideas. For example, when people wake up from REM sleep and think of a word, their ideas are more original than when they wake from other sleep stages. They think of surprising and creative ideas. 

I write better when I wake up from strong dreams. Even a bad dream can help me think better. On those days, I can write quickly. I do not know how it works, but it helps. 

Creativity is not just for writers or artists. We all need to think well in our lives. We need to dream to help us think creatively and solve problems with others. This is why dreams are important.

Susie Ray left London twenty years ago. She moved to a small town by the sea in south-west England. In her studio, you can see empty frames on the walls and pictures of her two daughters. Susie is a copyist artist. She can paint famous artworks very well. When she finishes her paintings, she sells them quickly. Many people want her work. 

In her 30 years as a copyist, Susie has painted works by famous artists like Renoir, Monet, and Van Gogh. Some people think her copies are the real paintings. The real paintings can sell for millions of pounds, but her copies sell for a few hundred to £12,000, depending on how much time she spends on them. 

Susie does not tell who her clients are, but they include art galleries and collectors. Some collectors want to show off their art. They might say they have a Van Gogh, but it is really a copy by Susie. Some collectors keep the real painting safe and show Susie’s copy instead. 

Susie is honest about her work. She tries to make her copies look real, but she signs her name on the back. It is illegal to sell a copy as the original. Susie knows people who do this, but she does not want to get in trouble. She is not very rich, but she is more secure now. 

Before being a copyist, Susie worked as an illustrator for a botanical garden. She learned to be very accurate in her work. She is happy she found a job that pays better. When young artists ask her for advice, she tells them to learn to draw well. 

Susie can draw many things, but she likes to copy French impressionist paintings the most. She thinks people think modern art is easy, but it is not. Impressionist artists painted quickly, but they were also very careful. 

Some people wonder why Susie does not make her own art. She has tried, but she feels her own paintings do not look as good. Susie is a perfectionist and wants to do her best.

Ellen MacArthur loved the sea and wanted to be the fastest sailor. She loved sailing since she was a child. When she was on her boat, she felt very happy. But when she was on land, she felt bored and wanted to go back to the ocean. 

One time, she came in second place in a big race called the Vendée Globe. After the race, she showed me her small boat, Kingfisher. She lived there for 94 days. She planned everything carefully, even how many paper towels she needed. She had special food and a small stove. Her boat was very important to her, and she took good care of it.

Ellen thinks the world is like a boat. It is small and beautiful, but it can be damaged. She had a big change in her life when she went to South Georgia, an island in the south Atlantic. There, she helped with a bird study. This made her think about how we use the earth’s resources. She saw old whaling stations and felt sad. She thought we take too much from the earth and do not give back.

Now, Ellen talks about saving the planet. She says we cannot keep using coal, oil, and gas because they will run out. She wants people to reuse things instead of using them once. She visits factories and talks to people about how we can use resources better. 

Ellen started the Ellen MacArthur Foundation, a charity that helps young people think about a better future. She misses sailing and the adventure of being at sea. But now, she feels that helping the planet is very important. She believes this work is more important than being the fastest sailor in the world.

Jordan Romero is 13 years old. He wants to be the youngest person to climb Mount Everest. If he does this, he could be very famous. Many young people spend time on computers and games. Jordan wants to inspire kids to go outside and climb. 

Jordan's team is his father, Paul, and his mother, Karen. They call themselves "Team Romero." Climbing Everest is part of their goal. If Jordan climbs Everest and another mountain called Vinson Massif in Antarctica, he will be the youngest person to climb the Seven Summits. The Seven Summits are the highest mountains on each continent. Few people do this before they are thirty years old. Jordan has already climbed five of them and might finish before he turns 20.

Some famous climbers think it is not a good idea for a 13-year-old to climb Everest. They say young climbers may be strong, but they might not be ready emotionally. They also think young people do not have enough experience to climb safely. 

Paul, Jordan's father, knows about these opinions. He says, "I hear the criticism, but I have to keep going. We think about the risks, but we believe our experience will help. Watching Jordan grow gives me confidence." 

Paul also wants to know why Jordan wants to climb. He says, "This is not about me. At first, Jordan wanted to do this later, but we thought, 'Why not now?' We talk to him to make sure he still wants to do it." 

When asked why he wants to climb, Jordan says, "I just focus on my goal." 

Today, many people want to be the youngest or fastest to climb a mountain. This makes climbing more popular. Jordan has to share his adventure online and give interviews. He needs to show something exciting, like climbing Everest. 

Paul says, "If Jordan comes home and wants to stop climbing and play basketball, we will stop this project and go to the gym."

When you see a teenager with an MP3 player, they are probably not listening to classical music. Many people know pop music groups, but they may not know who Brahms is. I am studying music at school, but my friends do not know much about classical music either. Most people do not buy classical music. Last year, only 3% of concert tickets were for classical music, and classical recordings sell very few copies. 

Why do fewer people like classical music now? Older people think teenagers spend too much time on TV and video games, but I don’t think that is the problem. Many teenagers do not find classical music interesting. Some teenagers do go to classical concerts, but they are not many. I play music in an orchestra, but I do not listen to much classical music. 

Teenagers like fast music. Classical music has many changes and takes time to understand. Pop music is simple and easy to listen to. It also talks about things that matter to teenagers. 

In the past, families played music together at home. Now, we can find any music online. You rarely hear classical music in shops. Some teachers say more people go to classical concerts now, but I think most of them are not teenagers. In my orchestra, we play in many places, but the audience is mostly older people. 

Some people say schools do not help teenagers like classical music, but many kids want to play classical music in their school orchestra. They practice a lot. They like playing classical music, but they do not listen to it for fun. When we want to relax, we listen to pop music.

Bonnie Wyndham got out of her mother’s car and looked at Almonside School. She said, “I will make you sorry I came here,” but she said it nicely. Her mother was getting out of the car too, so she did not hear Bonnie. Bonnie didn’t mind if she did. Her mother knew how Bonnie felt. 

Mrs. Wyndham looked around. Almonside School was strange. It had many buildings hidden in the trees on a hill. It was confusing at first. Then she saw signs: Science block, gym, riding center… “Riding center,” Bonnie said, suddenly interested. “Headmaster’s study,” her mother said. “This way.” Bonnie followed her mother along a wide path between the trees. 

“I wish you would walk beside me, not behind me like a dog,” Mrs. Wyndham said tiredly, but she did not expect Bonnie to do it. A few minutes later, her mother was talking to Bonnie’s new headmaster in his study. Bonnie sat and waited outside the door. Suddenly, she jumped up. “Why should I just sit here?” she said to herself. “I will be thrown out soon anyway,” she said to the door. “So why not go now?” 

She left the building and went to the riding center. There was a nice old building for the horses and a big place for indoor riding. Bonnie looked around, but no one was there. She walked carefully to the horses. Bonnie respected horses. They were well taken care of. Almost every stall had a horse. She looked at each horse and thought about it. 

“I know what you are doing here,” she said to a small pony, touching its nose. Then she saw the next horse. “But aren’t you the best!” she said. He was brown with a little white. He looked lively, and Bonnie liked that. “I feel like we have met before,” she said, petting his neck. “In my dreams, I was riding you to win a big competition…” The horse’s name was Maverick. 

Bonnie wanted to ride him. “I wonder where I can find a bridle and a saddle,” she thought. The room with the riding gear was open. She was happy to find it. While she put the saddle on Maverick, she forgot about her mother and the headmaster. 

When she sat on the big horse outside, she felt like a queen. At her old school, they called her Queen Bee, and she laughed when she remembered. “You are the best horse I have ever ridden, Maverick,” she said. “I know about horses, even if I don’t know about other things.” 

She nudged him to walk, then to trot. “If I stay here, I think we can be great friends,” she said. She rode around the paddock. The ride was exciting, and a little breeze touched her cheek. She felt that Maverick trusted her, and she was sure he would jump well.

Cody Simpson is a 15-year-old boy from Australia. He is a singer and has made many popular songs. Cody started playing guitar when he was six years old and wrote his first songs when he was seven. He loved swimming and surfing more than anything else when he was younger. 

When he was 13, he posted some videos of himself singing with a friend online. Many people liked the videos and wanted to see more. Cody recorded more videos at home, and people loved them. 

Cody was also a great swimmer. He trained hard and had good coaches. But then, music companies wanted him to sing. He had to make a big choice: stay in Australia and keep swimming or move to the US with his family to sing. Cody decided to move. 

He felt it was hard to choose what to do with his life at such a young age. He told his swimming coach and friends about his decision, and they were surprised. Cody is a quiet person and likes to stay humble. 

Cody and his family moved far away to follow his dream of being a singer. His family supports him but stays out of the spotlight. Cody thinks it is important to have good people around him. 

Sometimes, he worries about his little brother and sister. His brother is eight years old and travels with him. Cody thinks about how this affects his brother's life. But his family always tells him they support him. 

Cody believes that success comes from saying "yes" to big opportunities, even if it is scary. He is now visiting many countries and singing for many fans. It is a dream come true for him, but he knows it may not last forever.

I jumped out of bed and looked out the window. I saw the river. There was a crack in the ice shining in the sun. I looked at the sandbags. They were there to stop the water from flooding when the ice melted. My back hurt because I helped lift the sandbags last week with many people from the town. 

I looked at the river. There was a dark patch of water from a factory. The ice was thin on the sides, but solid further down. I took off my pajamas and put on my kayaking wetsuit. I saw a boy on the other side of the river. I did not know him. He was trying to stand on the ice near the warm water from the factory. 

I zipped up my wetsuit and put on my kayaking jacket. I checked my pocket for my lucky silver chain. My grandfather gave it to me. Only my mom, my grandfather, and I know about it. I also have my grandfather's diary from his trip to South America. I read it before I sleep. 

I went to the kitchen. “Good morning, Rex,” my mom said. She smiled at me while I took a banana. “You are up early for Saturday. I will make brunch after your training. Be careful.” “Thanks, Mom,” I said. 

I walked down the hall and almost bumped into my tall grandfather. “Watch where you’re going!” he shouted. “Where are you going?” “Sorry, Grandpa. I’m going kayaking.” He should know that by now. 

“What is the point of training? You didn’t win the competition,” he said. His words hurt, but I took a deep breath. He went into the bathroom and slammed the door. My mom came to me with a kind smile. “Don’t mind him. He’s…” “...not himself right now,” I said. I wanted to say he always was like this, but I didn’t. 

When I was little, he was my hero. He showed me pictures of his adventures in a magazine. Those pictures are still on his wall with his medals. But I don’t go into his room anymore. I have my own trophies now. I hope to be in that magazine one day too. 

Mom smiled. “At least he is coming out of his room more. Have a good training, Rex. I admire your hard work, even in the cold!” I smiled back and peeled my banana. “It will be warmer in South America if I find sponsors for my trip.” She laughed and went back to the kitchen. 

I finished my banana and went outside to the boathouse.

Mum took Jess by the arm. "Come with me," she said. Jess went with her to the study. On the table, there was a painting by Grandpa. It was not finished. "Do you know about this?" Mum asked. Jess shook her head. "I have never seen it before. I didn’t know he was painting."
